Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: L. Entringer
Reviews.Content: Works good during the daytime.  Night vision is OK, but has a bit of a dark ring around the outside where there isn't enough light from the LED's.  The mount is crap, there is no way to mount it from the top, only from the bottom or the back, and it doesn't hold well.  And what's with this awful color? Why would you make a security camera purple?

Reviews.Title: excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Denis Ayers
Reviews.Content: Only had it a few weeks but it's performing perfectly. And the price can't be beat. Excellent nighttime vision and color quality in daylight.I'd highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: sony 1/3
Reviews.Author: jjnvj
Reviews.Content: this camera is great. it has outstanding quality ! great price too. i highly recommend this. although the 12v adapter is too much for it i had to put a 9.5v . also shipping took a while but it was worth the wait !

Reviews.Title: Rugged design.
Reviews.Author: MyPen
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great even in very dark places. I highly recommend this product. It is extremely rugged and also very attractive to look at.

Reviews.Title: At the top of my short list
Reviews.Author: Albert
Reviews.Content: I have been doing a side-by-side outdoor security camera test for 3 weeks. This Sony camera has performed by far the best of 8 cameras that I have tested for color, IR night vision, viewing distance, inside lighting, and price. Just ordered 6 more and sent the others back. I will update this review once I have them all in place and running for a few weeks.Update: March 26, 2013I finished evaluating 8 indoor/ outdoor security cameras and by far this Sony is the best overall all purpose camera when comparing the price, color with indoor/ outdoor lighting, IR night vision within 25 feet, and daytime viewing distance within 60 feet. I must mention a couple of things too. I now have 8 of these cameras, but I had to send 2 cameras back because of viewing defects. Since I was able to see how well they performed I knew immediately that I had two "lemmons" when I hooked them up. No problem with returning them to Amazon for a refund. The other thing is that the camera cases (purple), wires (black/ tan, and mounting brackets (black/ silver)are not all the same shade (camera housing), color (wires), or style (brackets) if that matters. Since I had 8 cameras I was able to pair them up so that the differences are not really noticeable.The higher priced cameras I evaluated ($60 - 90) had better long distance daytime viewing and sharper colors, but this Sony camera out performed them for IR quality within the 25 - 30 feet range I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: shellbell
Reviews.Content: This camera is providing excellent coverage of my business-both day and night.It is a good choice for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: This product exhibits a very cheap lenses system, as demonstrated by the distorted fish bowl image it displays. What drew me to this particular item was it's low light levels, which is of great importance to my application for security monitoring. Don't waste your money on this one, I've got to waste mine sending this piece of junk back for the ARM item and I suppose a restocking fee. If they had a zero star that'd be my actual rating of this item.

Reviews.Title: Not too bad..
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: THis isn't too bad of a camera but not as good as the cheap $25.00 camera on Amazon.. Man that one is someting for only a few buck but this camera is goffey at night and not clear.... Had great shipping...

Reviews.Title: SecurityIng - 420 TV Lines 1/3 Inch Sony CCD
Reviews.Author: Shiky
Reviews.Content: by night, I like infrared leds can not easily see is good for short-rangeSecurityIng - 1/4 Inch Sharp CCD 420 TV Lines for Indoor / Outdoor  Day Night Security Camera

ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof Sony CCD Security CCTV Camera with Night Vision, Indoor / Outdoor Used. With 36 IR LEDs, The View Distance Can Up to Be 98.4 Feet Long.
Image Sensor: 1/3 Sony CCD, The Length of Lens: 6 mm. NTSC Effective Pixels: 512(H) x 492 (V). IR LED: - 36PCS, - Diameters: 5mm.
420 TV Lines Horizontal Resolution.Backlight Compensation: ON. White Balance: Auto.
Minimum Illumination: 0.000 LUX x F1.2(IR LED ON). Nighttime (IR) Viewing Distance: 98.4 Feet.
Waterproof Level: IP66. Aluminum Alloy Housing Material. Switching Between Day & Night Vision Is Completely Automatic.
ProductInfo.Name: SecurityIng® 420 TV Lines 1/3 Inch Sony CCD Weatherproof Surveillance CCTV Camera, 36 IR Infrared LEDs, Day Color Vision / Night Black White Vision, for Indoor / Outdoor / Home / Business Surveillance
